330a1(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 'dor gshegs payon tan grags pa bsod snyoms che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la/ gos kyi res ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas// dang po byang chub tu/ 
330a2(mdo): no sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bder gshegs srid spyan che// 'khor bcas bye ba sum bcu dag la gtsug laka khang // bzang por long s+yad phyir dang dpag tshad bcu'i kos// kadipe ba phul nas
330a3(mdo): byang chub sems skyed do// bder gshegs nyi 'od gzhan gyi khol gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i tshe de la// lcags kyi snod dag dbul bar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
330a4(mdo): gshegs skar mkhan tsho ba'i 'ur gyur bas// de bzhin gshin sa rgya phyogs gsal de la ni// nor bu rin chen dpag tshad gcig 'od da ldan/ phul nas dang sa byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de can
330a5(mdo): gagags pa mer cag dang dpon gyi// bur gyur deman de mazhin na shegs papo// blo gros pa'ang la 'breng 'a phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu rnasems 'byed do// de bzhin gshegs
330a6(mdo): dus ma byan rgyas bani// sran dgas ma khan ma bder gshegs tsam mchogs// tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'grong nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu rnamams bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' kyi
330a7(mdo): kyis ga sun cag cag nas// ra bzhi gagags la bgad ma can pam// dang pa byang chu btun thams babyed // bde gshin mtha #/ 
330b1(mdo): sems de la// cha'i stan dag dbul bar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ges byon pa khyim bdag gi// bur gyur de chen bder gshegs pad snying la// snga ma'i mi
330b2(mdo): tog yod pa'i sa gzhi phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzhan gyis mya thub rgyal mtshan gyis// 'jams banas lam du 'gron pa'i bsal byas nas// de bzhin gshegs/ 
330b3(mdo): bu khyed bu do la ni/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mchog dga' grags pa bu ram shing / 'tsho 'gyur chen de bzhin gshegs pa po// blo rnams 'byed la bu ram bcud khu zung / 
330b4(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bcwo na 'grus brtan pa bram ze'i bur gyur da tshe// bder gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la// khrus rkyen dga' ba'i chel dag phul nas kyang
330b5(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs klags rdzogs chang tshong bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng / ge'ing rol// lo ma'i snod las chu dag phul nas kyang // dang / 
330b6(mdo): bo byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bya stegs bral rgyal po'i bur gyur da che// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i nga ro la// so ma 'i sdod nas bar sha'i me tog phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sem
330b7(mdo): bskyed do// bder gshegs mchod 'os lnga ni blon mchog gyur dro ba'i che/ bder gshegs yid 'ong blo 'od dag la dpag tshad gcig/ khor sug tsam gyi spyad mos tshal phu'angs ka ru'i// 'dug pas bdugs rta
330b8(mdo): dpabo byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sgron chen gyi bkyen gyu rad pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od de la// rgyu sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang tho byang chub tu ni sems skyed/ 
331a1(mdo): bdir gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni lha'i bu'an// de bzhidi gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od del// me tog man dam ba'i gdugs sus nas// dang 'o byang chub tun sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pas pa/ 
331a2(mdo): zhim pas kar gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes de la// khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan mchog 'dzind sman pa'i tshe/ 
331a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa myed don la/ bdug pa dang ni der yug phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mun dang nam bral rgyal po li// 'dun 'don bur gyurd che na de bzhin gshe
331a4(mdo): dgra bcom gzi la mu tige brgyan 'greng dag/ phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa seng geli 'gram pa yi ste de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la/ 'das rdzab dag tu shing tham
331a5(mdo): btsugs nas phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen glegs pa spos 'tshong gi// bur gyur/ de chen bder gshegs dbyangs mngal la// byam spar gang dag rna
331a6(mdo): gtor yul nas// dang 'o byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spyan rab zhi ba rgyal bu'i tshe/ bsad bya bcon dag 'bris su bcug nas kyang // de bzhin gshegags mchag ro la ni// dang
331a7(mdo): 'byang chub dun sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bdud khri 'chang bkrong dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni// bye ru rtsa'i gdugs stong bus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems babyed do//

331b6(mdo): de bzhin gshenas pa zhas sug sde bdag la// snod dag chu yis bkang ste phus nas kyang // dang ma byang chub tu ni sems pa byed do// bdang gshegs skabs gshegs nim pa'i thung gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa me nam
331b7(mdo): da ci ma zhig sa dag ni gzugs 'byes nas kyang sa dang 'i byang chub tu ni thams babyud do// bad gshegs thog nas ni sungs kyang dpa'i ma dban dganags pa bya b.lam chad kyin / bem 'grangs/

333a2(mdo): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mtha' yas gzugs na shing rta mkhan// gyur da ched bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni sde// ba la shi ka dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu na sa

333a5(mdo): po'i// btsun mor gyur da tshe 'de gshegs bcon brtan la// me rta ga skyed mos tshal dag yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sem sa bskyed do// bder gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa mang bya ker/ 
333a6(mdo): gyurd tshe bder gshegs thub par grags de la// dbu zhu gcig gcig dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs don yod rnam gnon myi mjed bdag/ tshangs che 'der
333a7(mdo): gshegs grags pa'i rgyal mtshan la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gtogs par mdzad pa pos// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od
333a8(mdo): de la// spos kyi ril bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog rgyal mtshan rgyal bu'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gsal de la// cha'i sa bkab pa'i khang
333b1(mdo): bzangs phul nas kyang // dpa po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mi dbang rgyal po 'jug sa 'on so// de bzhini gshegs pa ga'i 'arjid mo dang// dbu rtswa legs par theg pa byas nas kyang // dang sa byang chub rngu
333b2(mdo): nisems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzi brjid mkhan po 'bru mar mkhan// gyur da che ba der gshegs dgra bcom mchod ras kyi// gtsug lag khang du gros bskos 'brumar daphul// dang po byang chubatu sems bskyed do// 
333b3(mdo): bder gshegs don mdzad gzigs pa til pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchog de la/ lhang cher leb leb bo dag yul nas kyang // dpal byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs grags pa mtha' yan
333b4(mdo): 'khor lor sgyur gyur che// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sems dpa' de la ni// 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gdugs stong phul nas kyang // dang 'o byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
333b5(mdo): gshegs pa ra ni chen lha ni 'jam glang gi// rgyal por gyur da tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgos mchod la// 'bras bu'i skyed mos tsha/ la dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed
333b6(mdo): do// de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas mkhyend pa chang tshong gi// bur gyur de chen de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu skyed// srang du gshegs tshe thal mo sbyar nas phyag byas nas// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni seMs
333b7(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo rdzogs rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rab dpal/ me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
333b8(mdo): bder gshegs mya ngan myed pa dga' bo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems dpa' de/ 'jigs pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rgyan drangs nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs
334a1(mdo): ba dri ma bral ba yis// sems can kun lU byams pa bsgoms byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa res 'byung ze de la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa shing drungs tshangs
334a2(mdo): lha gang drungs che// de bzhini gshegs pa lhun po dbyangs de la// bu ram shing gi sdong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'i dbang phyug ni// dge slong gyur da che de bzhin
334a3(mdo): gshegs pa'o// snga chogs gsung ba'i chos dag btong nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog phyam ni rgyal po'i// myor gyur da chen pader gshegs 'brug sba la// ud pal
334a4(mdo): dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sems bskyed do dbader gshegs nas 'byed chun bco bsag 'a'am/ kyar da da bder gshegs 'od chen phung ba'i// na bzal dag na bkrubs
334a5(mdo): byas nas kyang // dngas byang chub tun sems pabyed do// dacan na gshegs pa chos 'od kyis mi grong dag dang // yul 'amam rnams su pha rol daphyi drug sgra bsgrags nas// de banam
334a6(mdo): gnags 'dapa sa legs des yang // dang pa nyid du byang chub tun sems babyud // bad gaganas ku gzigs gas kyimam sa pa snang bam/ phyag lag sang mchas kyi 'drug cu byed bcug nas
334a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed par dga' de la// dang po nyid du byang chub tu rnamams babyud do// bdang gshegs yon tan 'od gsal phyag dang bar/ gyur dache ba de sa gshegs yul 'khor da lha des
334a8(mdo): rdol ba ba da dag bul par byas nas kyang / dang 'a byang chub tun thom sa bzud do// dmam bzhinanasa' thanas rnam pa'i bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngags dga' ba'i dbyangs de
334b1(mdo): kan tam me tog dag na gtong nas kyang // dang pa nyid du byang chub tun sems babyed do// bdang gshegs ran chen 'das da dpadang/ da pazhi ni gshegs pa 'od sa ga' las das/ danam 'a mgron ma sum
334b2(mdo): nas kyang // dang ba byang chub tun rnams pabyed pa/ de gnags na chan cag na grags ma'as // de bzhin gshegs pa mamadzan dag 'dis/ lpags pa'i dag ni dbus pabyas nas kyang / 
334b3(mdo): bgashas pa la kyang mang dman su kya / rapa / #lanakya// dang po tha
334b4(mdo): bder gshegs seng ge'i sku ni spos 'tshong che/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de la/ spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
335a1(mdo): da// mde gshegs pa' ma mchogs dacan mamam// de bzhin gshegs pa 'arigs byed byin da// cog can po dag na phrinapa kyang / 
335a2(mdo): byang chub tun sems paskyed/ gshegs pargyas dga' bu // de bzhin gshegs pa rgyanan rgyal pos// matog rna shas kyang // rang sa kyi da do// de bzhin
335a3(mdo): ba son tan phung lo/ chas chen la bu'i bram ze'i bur gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa za ba lnga de la// 'breng bul dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs yarba tog spos 'khod mo// de bzhin
335a4(mdo): gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od des// khang pa brtsegs par ma ma bya dkyi phus nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de ba'i ngan gshegs pa ma thu'ob shinga'i bran tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
335a5(mdo): grags pa med la// rgyun shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mthu mal mtha' yas tshong dpon bur gyur che// de bzhin gshegs
335a6(mdo): ud pa la chag pa gang zhig phrul nas kyang // dang po kyang chub tun sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyid tshodang dpon gyi// bu me de bzhin gshegs pa zag las// me tog 'bar shi skye ba'i mgani
335a7(mdo): rab kyang chu ni sems babyed do// 'di gshesas ga kya ga shen pa da yo / de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i rgyal lol// sa ga sa canan kyang // dnga'i byang rgyal na/ 
335b1(mdo): gshegs pa mthapa mam pa / 'ad gos 'i ka sa kyang// dang kya chub tuni ma da do// pan
335b2(mdo): sa dag gi rimi bu bral nas kya/ dang po byung chub tun sems bskyod do// bde gshegs legs kyis rgyam tshochong pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i snye sa dang thas des// namapa' ma
335b3(mdo): brgyan brel nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nor lhag pa 'chong // de bzhin gshegs pa thogs la des ni// cha'i sgron ma dag ni sras nas kyang // dang 'o byung
335b4(mdo): rgyab tu ni sems paskyed do// bder gshegs pa da gnyim 'ang ba gsems gan me// de bzhin gshegs pa yid sem mdzad des// gaper gyi'i tog dag nyig to nas kyang // da po kyang chu duni semam pa skyed do// 
336a1(mdo): bder gshegs 'dzin pa dpag myed gser tog che// de bzhin gshegs pa byamus pa'i dpal de la// gser ni spar kang gtor te phus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
336a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa mchog sred sbed dpon gyi// bu che de bzhin gshegs pa cho mchog la/ gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa choms myed
336a3(mdo): sngags makar che// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la// a ha ha ka dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs myig gnas grong khyer brten pa'i cha// bde bar gshegs
336a4(mdo): pa kun tu gzigs de la// me tog rangs pa dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa des gnas thags mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzigs
336a5(mdo): de la/ sku rakas dag ni phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tshogs can che zo 'an/ na myed bur gyur da che// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud zil gnon
336a6(mdo): pa de la ni// mon sran gre'u'i 'brum pa sar me phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'gro ba'i 'od gzer 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// bder gshegs shing rta chen po 'khor
336a7(mdo): bcas bye spongs// rgyal po'i zhal zas dag ni thim pa byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
336a8(mdo): seng ge'i stabs kyis gshegs de la// dpag tshad bcu gnyis khyon cam skyed mos chal phul nas/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rgyal ni 'bru mar mkhan gyi che// de bzhin gshen/ 
336b1(mdo): tha 'i man/ pas 'phru ba dag dbul pa bya gas kyang / dang pag sem su brjed do// de bzhin ga rji sa pa sa zhu pa'i// de bzhin gshe na tu byed sa/ 
336b2(mdo): 'dag pa'i chal kyis skrod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs don gyi blo gros nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la/ kha ma'i dum bu dag ni
336b3(mdo): pras nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po bye 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'ad de la// phye'i bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
336b4(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tha ba sbas pa ldan pa'i tshe// dge 'dun dag la sar khu phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs dpa gzigs pa'i phung po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/

336b7(mdo): gshegs ma grags byin grong nyer gshegs te mchod rten la// brten pa'i chen de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal// grong khyer dag tu gshegs kar me tog tor nas nya // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed
336b8(mdo): do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin pa ni// nor bu ma khan me de bzhin gshegs pa'o// yon tan 'od la nor bu'i ze re phul// dang po byang chubatu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skyes bus byin pa bag
337a1(mdo): gzigs del// 'gro gdag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gan gas pa sred myed bu ni khyim bdag se// 'brog dgon das tu
337a2(mdo): la // dbazhin gnagasas pa rnams can da ni/ na sas bskyed// na gnags pa des pa dpan las bya /

337b1(mdo): gshegs pa nyi za 'go'u ta ma'i cha// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog pad spyan la// dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs/

342a1(mdo): po de la ni// rin chen yu ba bcas pa'i rdugs 'bum phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa ded dpon bur gyurd che// de bzhin gshegs pa ma
342a2(mdo): pa bkod pa de la ni// rin chen snam bu lnga ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang // drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mchod grags chal chen lha bu'i bram ze'i che// 'kho na byi bar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
342a3(mdo): 'jig rten rnam pa grags pa khrus kyi med kya phul// dam po byang chub tu ni sems paskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa chos grags las gnod ce// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shus byin pa'i// 'chags dag ga
342a4(mdo): kyang // dang po byung chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhinanashegs pa srog 'byin dpon te// de bzhin gshegs pad grabs thA las sa// sI'i ba dag ni dbul pa byas nas kyang /

342b4(mdo): tu ni sems bskyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa grags mchog sa pa 'dod ce// de bzhin gshegs pa cus zhugs med pa// snga ma'i mi tog thun po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// mad
342b5(mdo): gshegs thugs rab gzhungs la phyag dam pa'i// bu me de bzhin gshegs pa lha gas pa la// mngon gsum dag tu baspyod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nem thun
342b6(mdo): blta pa'i chi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bras myed gshegs des// swa'i gnas myed 'ab dag phras nas kyang // dam po byang chub tun sems bskyed do// pade gshegs drug shus 'di ser dgon pa'i// dge ga
343a1(mdo): ya chen ba de gshegs sus 'khor sa/ de la chos gas las byam thus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sem pa 'byed do// de gshes pa 'dus thugs grub myed rgyam bu'im/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par byas des

343a8(mdo): gshegs yon tan brgya mtsho grong rdal gyi// byis pa chen bde gshegs byang chub 'od// de la tshems shing dka ni pus kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer ldan pa tshong dpon gyi// bu che de bzhin gshegs pa

347b7(mdo): do// bder gshegs rtul zhugs brtan pa thon me'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas par gzigs de la// khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha'i gzi brjid dam chos

352b8(mdo): sgra'i dbyangs ni thos pa'i// khye'u tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen la// 'phreng ba'i chun po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mngon shes tog ni rigs cho'o che// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od
353a1(mdo): dus// dang dang 'dug pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// de bzhi gshegs pazhag 'od rgyam bu nga// debazhin gshegs pa mdzes dag ldan pa'i// namamasanyis dag ni bkun byas nas can/ 
353a2(mdo): rang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba khyim bdag che// bder gshegs so srid pa' 'a nong bu mos de la// rgun phrad mya cug na gsos nas kyang // dang po byung na ba tun sems bsrud ngo do// 'di gshegs
353a3(mdo): tshangs pa'i mthing du 'tshor pa'i // de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar gnas de la// 'ding bu'i nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs paskyed ma chog tshang dpon bur gyur te// de bzhin gshegs
353a4(mdo): bklags pa bskum de la// gur kug gi dbul pa byas nas kyang // dang / dbo byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spyan stug sbom 'a tshong bre'u 'dzi// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la/ smom
353a5(mdo): kyi khyim mang gang gtongs kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed // de gshegs thas byin tham 'anabyung ma'am// nan/ shegs par yi pos// rtswa'is bgang pa'i slor dag sas nas
353a6(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden tog tshong dpo ma te// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dges de la// gser gyi khri kun dag na phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs
353a7(mdo): brgyan pa spos 'tshob ste// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal des// gros kyi srungs dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs sum phyed dbyangasa'i sngags 'gar gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa
353a8(mdo): slod lam mala' yas sa// lcags las byas pa'i snod dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin can 'ad ni ded dpon // de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od 'amal// spos kyi 'di gu dag gi
353b1(mdo): gdugs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni phyin pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar bzod de la// dpyid ka cha bron gong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
353b2(mdo): bder gshegs seng ge dag ni 'gar ba'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la// de la khab dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'od zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan ki tshe
353b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid de la ni// sha na dag las byas pa'i mababa' phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes dpa' bo grong rdal gyi// khye'u chen de bzhin gsheg pa blo gsal
353b4(mdo): la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sem das bskyed de// bder gshegs pad ma'i snying po yis pa'i// khye'u tshe dan de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas blo la// me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor
353b5(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs me tog rgyas pa las gla'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor byin de la ni// dus ma yin par bcud ldan btung ba phul// dang po byang chub tu ni
353b6(mdo): sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mthu ldan stabs ni ral pa can// sbyin bsreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// zhum myed dbyangs la zhugs ling phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams/ 
353b7(mdo): phung po tshong pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la// lhung bzed spad chis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzugs mchog grong khyer srung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs/ 
353b8(mdo): pa zla ba bzang po la// btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan spob 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzugs de la// spos kyi rgyu dag phul
354a1(mdo): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tha ba'i smon la spongs mo'o che// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam 'byor de sems pa la// 'gron bu nyi shu dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni ses
354a2(mdo): bskyed do// bder gshegs kazi brjid phung po ma thun che// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mor gnas de la// lnga las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs byang chub rgyal po shipe ta'i/ 
354a3(mdo): mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dpal lo ya// shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs myi zad shing rta mkhan gyi che// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdul dka' la// bzhugs khri'u dag ni phul
354a4(mdo): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs/ mngon rtogs spyan ni sman pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzig sa de la// sdug sman dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub
354a5(mdo): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yan lag rgyas pa phyugs rdzi'i de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i smon de la// lhung gzed dang bas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 'der
354a6(mdo): gshegs yul 'khor shes rab mar 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la// thun mar srang brgyad dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ni bong rdzi'i che/

358a1(mdo): na #/ gzhin gshegs pazhis pa da / mamam napa na// na
358a2(mdo): ra sbyi grags pa la gus byed pa'i chetshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ga'i 'arjid chen po de la ni// 'das pa'i chas dag sbyar ba byas te dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gsheg pa 'di gan myi dge de de bzhi ba srog na
358a3(mdo): bu yug langs te 'jams kyi btung ba phus te// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha nyi phyugs lnga'i dpon po 'chi// s+ya yugs rag na sus nas kya // da pa rgya tshul tu rna sems bskyed de// nga dzin da
358a4(mdo): sngags pa pas// dal da smra // sngab tu da dan du ladams kyang chu ga tu phyir da/ bzhan sa do/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'doms nas
358a5(mdo): la/ zhun mar ni nos pa dang daphul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sri sa bskyed do// bder gshegs zhes rab byi ni phug la khan che// de bzhin/ gshegs pa mtha' yas 'argyan de la// phuka dge byas te dbul ba byas nas
358a6(mdo): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mnyam bzhag bdag nyid khyim bdag che// de bzhin gshegs blo 'bar de la ni// tis 'brus spar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
358a7(mdo): gshegs gzi mdangs 'bru mar spos can mkhan gyi che// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa'i dpal de la// sna ma'i me tog yod pa'i 'bru ya sang brgyad phul/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal
358a8(mdo): rigs las stond che// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs dbyangs de la// lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skal ldan shing rta bu ram chang mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa yon
358b1(mdo): tan dmyigs pa byin de la// skyu ru ra'i bcud khu dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog cha 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa chang mar gnas de dag/ zla ba gsum du tshal byar
358b2(mdo): drangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rnam par krol gtsug shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim spos de la// chu 'brum bcud khu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
358b3(mdo): bder gshegs chos ldan yur ba mkhan gyi che// yur ba dag ni bskor te byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spos gnas tshong dpon chung ma'i tshe// de bzhin
358b4(mdo): gshegs pa ri bo'i phung po la// dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba nas kya dang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa grags spangs sman pa'i che// 'bru mar btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po
358b5(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes mdzod ni phag sa mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la// ras kyi kha/ tshar dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde
358b6(mdo): gshegs tshangs gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur che// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os de la// me tog 'bar sha'i chun 'phreng phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dam tshong dpon tshe'i// de ba'i
358b7(mdo): gshegs par dbang bzegs pa la// kab so dag las byas pa'i bdan zhi phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mya ngan myed pa'i gser mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ne// dngul las byas pa'i ye
358b8(mdo): tog gto das kyang/ gdang po byang tu gtun sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ga'i 'od zer sa// a bka ra gyu rang med panan gshegs// ldan ma da lam kar phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bdedan
359a1(mdo): gshegs yul 'khor tog mchong pa'i tshe// bder gshegs tshogs dbyangs kyis brgyan tes// ba so'i 'ang pa bathegs pa phus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pad ma'i snying po
359a2(mdo): dge slong tshe// 'jim pa dag las gzugs ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas tshang tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa gsal de la// kru ba dag ni dbul ba byas nA/ 
359a3(mdo): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs lha'i 'od zer dge slong che// bco lnga'i che na chos kyi sbyin byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan spong ba la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder
359a4(mdo): gshegs shes rab me tog spos 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon pa ra shes 'od la// spug gi nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chu rab tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa 'bras
359a5(mdo): 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs gi stobs de la// 'bras kyi spang ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ do// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byor da ldan ni// shing rta mahA/ 
359a6(mdo): tshe bder gshegs gsal ba'i dpal// de'i klung gi stobs dag byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyig zhing srungs che// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar grags de la// na ga'o// 
359a7(mdo): dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs phyag na rin cen rgyal po yis// de bzhin gshegs pa nas grol 'od zer de'i ni// na maza' dag mi kha dog bskur nas kyang // dang po byang chub
359a8(mdo): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dbang ldan tshal gyi las byed che// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam gnon la// kha rdzu ri'i 'bras bu brgya phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rdzogs pa
359b1(mdo): gsung bzhing srungs che// de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po la// sta ka ma dag ni dbul gnas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gsung shing srungs mo// de bzhin gshegs pa
359b2(mdo): gnas kyi me tog la// go ta ra na'i me tog gtor phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os rgyal bu'i che// rdzing bu dag ni byas te bshams nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal de la
359b3(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs nyi ma blon po rna'i ga/ bder gshegs rnam par smin pa chen po la// rdo las/ byas pa'i khang pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'dam rgyal skur/ 
359b4(mdo): pa 'tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la// skud pa sra da cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes brnyes pa chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs
359b5(mdo): pa gshegs par dgyes de la// bcud bu'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang dang 'o byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa grong dpom che// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sonam gnom sa
359b6(mdo): klong gi sa chog la bcu gcig yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sems bskyed do// bde gshegs pa ma tha 'bru mam mkhan gyi'i// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i phung po la// me tog 'a' mnas bsgom pa'i 'jam sus / 
359b7(mdo): da kya matsun palas babyud // sa gagamagan#/ sa sna @ ca maca pal 'byed / 
359b8(mdo): gshegs pa ya byed 'gar ba'idzi// de bzhin gshegs pa lta'i na nas// ma grongs gi nas brgyam nas kyang // dang po kyang chub tun sems paskyed do// sadeng gshegs pa zhes ldan ba cung zung // nam dag ni zung
360a1(mdo): byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ston da ka'i nyi ma la// nor bu bye dUr+ya dag phul nas kyang // dang
360a2(mdo): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'od zer dra ma lo ma'i khur khyer tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blta na stag de la// ha myin 'dze li me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bye dU r+ya'i snying// 
360a3(mdo): po shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i blo de la// oM 'dra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
360a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa me tog la// tang ka'i me tog dag ni dbul dab byas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs da'i rgyal po ded dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dbyangs de la
360a5(mdo): skyed mos tshal ni bcu snyed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'gar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gan gas pa bdud rtsi'i cho ka la// ril ba spyi thugs phul nas kyang // dang
360a6(mdo): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong lcags 'gar che// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra de la// snar krugs pa'i pyad dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs
360a7(mdo): ba dge 'od dge slong che// de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i lha de la// nor bu'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan mchog la kun gyi 'od// tshong pa'i chen bder gshegs dbyang/ 
360a8(mdo): mchog la// shing na ka'i me tor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal// phyag dar ba che bder gshegs dpal dgyes la// gtsug lag khang dang 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang
360b1(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skyes bu'i tha ba bram ze'i tshe// cod rong dag tu 'ab pa byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i grags pa la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs/ 
360b2(mdo): pasgra gcan bram ze'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog gi// bdas dag yud tsam bting ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bdud kyi'i 'od ni gzhan zam che// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod
360b3(mdo): pa chen po de// nyin mo bzhugs pa'i gnas su bdan bting nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mchog ma tshong dpon gyi// bu che bder gshegs 'jig rten tha la ya// dA ru ka ra'i me tog gtor
360b4(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od ded dpon che// bder gshegs blo sa rol tu zhugs pa ma// mtshan da mo ma smon dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
360b5(mdo): bder gshegs zhi ba'i stabs ni rgyal bu'i tshe// khang bzangs 'dzeg cebader gshegs ldan 'od la// me tog gi chun po phul nas kyang // dang tho byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes rgya mtsho myi bkren che
360b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od gzil// skyu rum dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ring dbang 'phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bya chu gzi brjid la// me tog 'phreng ba khru gang
360b7(mdo): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rab zhi sman pa'i khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgongs pa sbyangs pa la// sman gyi gsos sman dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
360b8(mdo): yon tan mtha' stobs spyan rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od de la// tsan tsa d+ha ka dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs lha dbang nyis pa khye'u'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul de la ni// me
361a1(mdo): tog mya ngar 'chang gi chun po phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung stan spos 'tshong mo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud mi me tog gi// bzhugs pang thos kyis byug pas phyags nas kyang / 
361a2(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ngos bzangs phal chen bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po ya// 'dun khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs/ 
361a3(mdo): pa don gnas myi bkren che// de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs de la// snod dag chu'i sa bkang ste su g+ha nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan gzi brjid dpal ni khyim bdag che// dge 'dun dag/ 
361a4(mdo): la rnyed pa sdum bka phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub pad ma de la ni// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zla myed mkhyend ldan chis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i sa mchod de la
361a5(mdo): kur gum byug pa lag pas phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems laskyed do// bder gshegs ngaro dpag myed phyug rje'i che// de bzhin gshen/ sa pa 'das las rgal ba la// sar ni ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang
361a6(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzangs sdom 'tsho ba che// de bzhin gshegs bu srid pa gsal bas// kun tu ra'i 'dug pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shinang tu
361a7(mdo): thugs bzhugs kyi bkres te// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog la/ shebs lo sbyar ra byas te phyag 'tshal nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug bral// 'khor lom sbrum che bde gden/ 
361a8(mdo): dpal chen la// grong khyer dpag cad bcu pa zhus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad par 'phags// shing srungs chen bder gshegs 'od bzhin la// le gu'i 'bras bu dag ni yul nas kyang / 
361b1(mdo): dang po byang chub na sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mchog tu mdzes gshegs yis pa'i che// bram po yin bder gshegs me 'od la// me tog kar ni ka ras tor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ni
361b2(mdo): don rgyal po'i pho nya che// de bzhin gshegs pa blta na stug de la// lan grangs brgya rnyed bskor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa skyon myed brtan bcas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar dgyes// 
361b3(mdo): de la// mon sran gre'u'i 'bras bu phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs blo dbyangs dge ba shing 'tshong tshe// sgo gang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbyangs de la// dang po byang chub
361b4(mdo): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pad ma'i mdzod ni dge slong che// de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin pa la// sku'i khrus dang dbul ba byas na/ des kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'od gzer
361b5(mdo): bzang po dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i mthu chal la/ bso da snyoms dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spros pa'i mdog ni shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs
361b6(mdo): thogs myed blod la// gu ti'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa stegs bzangs sgo ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs 'od srong khyer gshegs pa na// thal mo sbyar te phyag dag btsal nas kyang
361b7(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tshogs dbang tshong dpon bur gyur pa che// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying po la// rna rgyan 'phreng ba dag ni phul ba'i che// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs bral
361b8(mdo): bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od de la// me tog ta ra na yis gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ye shes bzhed pa dbul po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la// 'phongs pa
362a1(mdo): pa myed pas spyan ni drangs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs stobs spyan dka' thub can gyi che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'de ba'i 'od de la// so ma'i skyil po dag mi phus nas kyang / 
362a2(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mchog tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog de la ni// a ka ru'i bdug pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa
362a3(mdo): zla ba shing thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de la// ba ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin cen zla 'od tshong pa'i tshe// bder gshegs yid gnyis las mi 'das pa la// nor bu
362a4(mdo): rin chen me shel phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mdun 'don bur gyur che// bder gshegs 'khrul pa myed pa da'i blo ldan la// sin bA ra'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni
362a5(mdo): sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gzigs pa chen po A thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul shugs 'byor da de la// ma ka ru'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa
362a6(mdo): tshangs dbyangs sman pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes de la// rgya shuka 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba phul nA kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dbyangs bzangs lha ris pa'i che// bu yug yangs che 'ang pa phyag
362a7(mdo): nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs byed dges des// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shes rab che stegs dad pa'i nga// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags dbyangs la// pa pi ling gi 'bras bu phul nas kyang / 
362a8(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs blo gros zla myed tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni chen po de// nyi ma 'ga' zhig bzhugs par gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rdo rje 'then
362b1(mdo): ni byis pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed ldan la// til dang bsres pa'i 'bru dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs byang chub blo gros rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgongs pa chen po la/

362b3(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs mdangs snyan 'dron po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu phal chen po de// 'jigs pa myed par yam kar s+yan drangs nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs
362b4(mdo): bsod nams stobs ni tshong dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba gzigs de la// zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal dge slong che/ 
362b5(mdo): bzod pa dag ni bsgoms pa byas nas kyang // dpang byang chub tu rnam pa/ sa bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa gnod pa spangs pa la// dang po byang / chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags shes dgon
362b6(mdo): pa'i dge slong che// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba gsal de la// sran gyi phye tsam dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rims myed dpal de la
362b7(mdo): 'bras bu sar pa mchog dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skar dges bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom stegs de la// snod dag spang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub/ 
362b8(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin gyi rnga sgra spos 'tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan legs brtsams la// u shi re'i phye ma yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan dka' stug pa'i
363a1(mdo): ya phyag dang ba mer chen 'dungs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun tugasas de la// dang po kyang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pa shes 'bang ldan sa tu dan tshe// rabazhin gshegs bya ba'i gzi brjid la// snod
363a2(mdo): dag 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor da ldan brten bcas che// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchod gnas la// la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs
363a3(mdo): bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan phung po kun rgyu'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la// kri sA sa la'i pags pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs gsal ba rgyal po'i bu mo che// de bzhin
363a4(mdo): gshegs pa me tog nyi ma la// gser gyi 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang dadang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtsham da rmongs mo'iche// de bzhin gshegs pa legs gnas zhabs de la// gos
363a5(mdo): gi ras ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed/ do// bder gshegs ye shes pa ro tshong dpon gyi// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs/ pa gsal tog la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po
363a6(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' shing thun tshe// bder gshegs sna ma'i me tog gsal de la// rgya shug dag gi me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mchod sbyin nga ro
363a7(mdo): brten bcas che// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi 'od de la// bal sran gre'u dag ni sbyar ba'i 'bru mar phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs shes rab rnam 'god pa ro ni// ral pa can che bder gshegs yon tan bzhed
363a8(mdo): de la dka' thub gnas dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid bzo mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog de'i ni// chos gos snam phyar dag ni grub pa nas kyang // dang po
363b1(mdo): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs drang srong dpon po bsod snyoms tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mdzes pa la// khab ral dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs blo ldan phyug rdzi
363b2(mdo): dpon po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba smang mdzod la// lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spros pa'i tshogs ni rgyal bu tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de la
363b3(mdo): tsam pa kha'i tshal dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mchod sbyin bzang po shing thun tshe// bder gshegs kun tu yon tan mchog de la// shing bal dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs
363b4(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba yar 'tshong che// de bzhin gshes/ das pa gzi brjid nas rgyal la// zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shin tu gzigs pa da cung
363b5(mdo): mkhan// byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod la// bag chos dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa// 
363b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'dren mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la// s+phu kri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan tshogs ni khros pa'i
363b7(mdo): bder gshegs 'khrul pa myed cing sbyor ba la// khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs me tog ldan pa khyim bdag che// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po yi 'khor dang bcas te
363b8(mdo): byi ba dag/ g.yar gnas bu gsum zhas nas ro brgyabs gsol nas/ dang po byang chub tu na sems maskyed do// bder gshegs yul 'khor spobs pa dbul po'i ma// de bzhin gshegs pa ying 'ong dbyangs de la// mar me'i snying po dag ni
364a1(mdo): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen rab sbyin byi pa byed pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa gyod pa mnos nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dbyangs can de la ni// dang
364a2(mdo): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs zla ba dges pa rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam sbyangs pa la// skye'u gsher me tog gis gtor nas// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs khengs myed
364a3(mdo): bcwa pa mkhan gyi che// de bzhin gshegs pa lha 'dod de la ni// mar khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs

364a5(mdo): lo ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bdud migs la gas la chos mkhan che// de bzhin rgan/ gas pa tshangs pas mchod de la// gser snam dag ni dbul lanas kyang

368a2(mdo): thard pa'i rtul shugs myi bkren tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spong ba'i shugs de la// pri yang gu'i bsod snyoms phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs tshul khrims 'od ni dbul po'i che// de bzhin gshegs
368a3(mdo): pa rin cen gtong de la// tshod ma'i khu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rtul zhugs gnas pa khyim bdag gi// bu mo che na bder gshegs ye shes shugs// de la ud pal lnga ldi phul nas kyang // 
368a4(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rdul myed 'phreng rgyud bu mo'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa bram ze de la ni// pad ma 'dab brgyad pa dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
368a5(mdo): bder gshegs snying po 'phags pa tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tha rad pa bzang po la// ras yug gcig cig dgab pa byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa myig sman
368a6(mdo): stond che// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs ni rnam gnon la// a 'bra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phel mdzad rgyal po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid snang ba
368a7(mdo): la// gser gdugs yu ba bye du r+yas byas pa// phul nas dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spos 'od tshong dpon bur gyur da che// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i stobs de la// byug pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang
368a8(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dus mkhyend 'od ni rdza mkhan che// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal de la// kham pa dag las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dran
368b1(mdo): ba'i dbang po tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo de'i// lam du zam pa dag ni btsugs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal bzang 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni sdug de la/ 
368b2(mdo): me tog ku mu ta ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs thogs myed rgyal mtshan 'breg mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ldan dbyangs de'i// phyag gi sen mo dag ni bcad nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
368b3(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs byang chub mchog bgrod lam stond tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud che'i gzugs de'i// spyan sngar lam dag mtshon pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'gyod
368b4(mdo): gsal tshong dpon bur gyur da che// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros ral// mu tig do zhes dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin cen rgyas pa phyag dang ba// byed che bder
368b5(mdo): gshegs zla ba chen po la// mchod sbyin gling bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug dge slong che// chos rnams yang dag gzung phyir sems btud nas// de
368b6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa thogs myed dbyangs de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs lha ni thams cad gser rtog che// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog la// gsen gyis spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang // dang po byang
368b7(mdo): chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bshes gnyen po na shing ta ma Shan// byed che bder gshegs snyoms par gzigs de la// khang ba'angs dag ni byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs pan+de
368b8(mdo): gnyen bzang po tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chen po la// snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rab tu zhi stabs lam stond che// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
369a1(mdo): ya / bzhed des/ a bdag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang 'o byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs 'dud mi bdag can ba tog byed pa'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa phung po bcu pa de sa ni// lung bzed ma 'bra dag gis/ 
369a2(mdo): kis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs lhun po'i 'od ni rgyal po'i che// de bzhin gshegs sna tshogs 'od des// grong khyer dag mi tha res g.yogs nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
369a3(mdo): bskyed do// bder gshegs 'phags pas bstod pa las ston che// de bzhin gshegs pa ku yis byin pa de'i ni// lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sdang ldan khyim

369a6(mdo): bul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs legs spyan nas sbyin bca' ba ma'am// byed che bde gshegs dbyangs kyi sprin de la// lung bzed bca' bas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//

369a8(mdo): pa ngan song spong ba la// me tog na rgyan dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin cen 'od ni dge slong bsnyen bkur ba// byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog la// mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang
369b1(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gyod ldan khyim bdag che// bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dag bzung nas kyang // de bzhin gshes pa spyan mdzes ldan pa la// dang po byang chub tu ni/ sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bsod nams
369b2(mdo): stobs ni khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la// mal stan shing bal can ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho shing rta mkhan// byed che bder gshegs rtul zhugs chen po

369b6(mdo): sobs tshogs pa'i ga/ bder gshegs bsam kyis kyi khya ba 'od de la// 'greng ba dag las byas pa'i tha'i bus// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs kyi byed gro yanga'i zhan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od
369b7(mdo): de la// shi mna'i 'greng ba dag ri phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa brgya mtsho drang po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa za ba'i 'od de'i// rgyan sngar klu dbyangs dag ni blangs nas kyang // dang po byang

373a8(mdo): ba yan lag langes pa la/ gan bza' phrugs gcig cigan pus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sems bskyed do// 'deb gnags san su rim pa'os/ phyag dang dag ni bya ba byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dbas na
373b1(mdo): mchog des// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs lhag rgyal phyugs rdzi'o dpon po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gi ba zhes bsnyen la// 'o ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni mos
373b2(mdo): bskyed do// bder gshegs nor bu gsal ba'i dka' bu ban// byed tshe bder gshegs yid gnyis spong ba po// de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ma sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nang
373b3(mdo): sbo cho che// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ldan de la// karan pa na gcig ri'i 'bru mar dang / spos yul dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'ake'u ta ma che// dbyar gnas pa dag dbul
373b4(mdo): byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dpal de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen pa ro dbyangs tshong dus pa de bder gshegs dgra bcom gnas// de la zhun mar bre gang phul
373b5(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs skye/ dbang rgyal po tshong dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gnas de la// / kun dga' ra ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// 
373b6(mdo): bder gshegs spyi sbed pa shing srungs che// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus cher dgongs la// sgye'u gsher dag gi dum bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dge yadzad chu chun che/ de bzhin
373b7(mdo): gshegs pa 'od ni 'bar ba la// chu drang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs seng ge bro gros khyim bdag che// de bzhin gshegs pa mthul phral sdud pa la// me tog blta na sdug pa phul nas
373b8(mdo): kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rin chen grags pa shing srungs che// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa zab sgoms la// sgra dbyangs dag gi mchod pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// 
374a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad phyag po' tsho// de bzhin gshegs pa go sred de la ni// rnga bo me dag btu ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu mi sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mdzad mtha' gzigs pa khyim bdag che// gtsug laka khang
374a2(mdo): dag byas te phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs srid pa'i me tog zhus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed klo la// zhus ras dag ni dbul ba byas
374a3(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mdzod spu ldan pa drang srong che// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la// ku na sha las byas pa'i ni bza' phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs spobs pa
374a4(mdo): mtshungs phyed rgyal po'i ro mo mkhan// byed che de bzhin gshegs pa yon tanabakod pa po// de la me tog dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po nyid duHngang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs rnam 'byed nga ro 'gron po'iche
374a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs seng ge la// lam slang dag tu gos dag/ khating ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder / shegs seng ge'i mche ba dge slong che// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros
374a6(mdo): lhung bzed chu du s+phu ru ras bkang phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs mdzes par gshegs pa ded dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lhun po la// seng ge'i bdan khri dka ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
374a7(mdo): tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs bsod nams 'khor los sgyur rgyal che// de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro spangs pa la// rin po che las byas pa'i bla re phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chos sgron gdugs ni
374a8(mdo): tshong ba'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba rnam 'byed la// srung bzed rin po che dag yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dag gis ldan pa chong pa'i dpon po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal 'i dpal de
374b1(mdo): kun dga' ra ba dag mi phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ma sems bskyed do// bder gshegs yul 'khor mya ngan myed pa po// tshong dpon de che stan rings phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba la/ dang po byang chub tu ni sems skyed do// 
374b2(mdo): bder gshegs blo gros sems pa khyim bdag me// gnas dang zas kyi rkyen ris bcad nas kyang // bder gshegs yon tan phung po 'od de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan 'ug pa'i che/ gos dang zhi pa la/ 
374b3(mdo): dag ni bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs de la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs chos sgron gyen ni dbul po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ldan de sa// rgya man drus pa dag ni phul nas kyang / 
374b4(mdo): dang ma byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shugs 'don du chang ma'am che// de bzhin gshegs pa nam grangs rgyal po la// bu radapag bcung zhwa 'thung ba shul// dang po byang chub tu na sems bskyed do// 
374b5(mdo): bder gshegs stobs chen tshong pa'i chung ma'i che// phye khal gsum ni mnyug mar bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul pa la dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs shes rab me tog
374b6(mdo): ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi mchog ma de'i// lam sra ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs brtan pa'i dbyangs ni ded dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'o 'od zer
374b7(mdo): gos kyi bla re dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ldan smad tshong che// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sems pa la/ sha'i phur me dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni seMs bskyed do// 
374b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa don gsum tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can rab mchog lnga// ku ka'i bdadan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs dges gsal krong rdal ba 'i tshe// de bzhin
375a1(mdo): gshegs pa gtsug phud dges de la// la mra dag dang sbyar ba'i btung ba yul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bder gshegs ser ge zhal ni phreng rgyud che// bder gshegs kha dog zil kyis mya non la// me tog khal bcu dag ni tor/ 
375a2(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug yud shing srung che// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la// spos dpa ma 'dra 'bras bu yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
375a3(mdo): gshegs pa ldang mdzad spong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal ba'i// bshos dag bdag nyid btsongs te sbyar nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas gdod gi tshul// rdzogs so// 
375a4(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// de ltar sangs rgyas dag sa chung ba 'am// yon phul rnam par sbyin pa 'di dag yin// 'khor de la 'bras bu de 'dra na/ mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems
375a5(mdo): gyi skyed// nam mkhal dag ni tshad dag bzung ba dang // rgya mtsho chen po maHra gyis 'grang nus kyang // sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gau// 'am/ de nams chad bzung ba ni nus par dkal// ji srod mya ngan 'das bdem
375a6(mdo): reg par// de srid myi 'o ma sdug bsngal myong myi 'gyur// de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thol nas// bka yod kyi yos bkur sti mchod pa kyis// sangs te sa dog la lhag par mos pa'i// bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la/ 
375a7(mdo): mchod pa chung shas byed pa'i yon tan mtha'// bsam par nus pa yin na de lta zhog/ byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba yon phul dang // gang dag chad byed chos 'di bzhi po dang // nam mkha'i khams dang sems can khams kun dag/ 
375a8(mdo): ston pa ya togs shes par nus pa byed// gang phyir sems can thams cad rjes bzung phyim// byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar// dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyi// ka ter dag rnyed pa de ltar dga' ma yan/ 
375b1(mdo): sangs rgyas byang chub phyir mi rgyal ba'i// rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang // sems can sdud pa lnga brgya dka' mdzad gzhi// rtags byed 'jug pa dang ni brgyad khri ded rtogs par byed pa brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / bla na byed pa 'i sgo ma
375b2(mdo): drug khri dang // sa rnams 'byed dang ye shes bdun bcu drug/ sangs rgyas mtshon pa spyod pa bco brgyad pa// pha rol gnon pa lnga dang bstan pa bcu// khyod yul zer 'bum phrag ni bcu gcig dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi
375b3(mdo): yon tan kang // mtshan dang dpel byad dag dang khyod lam dag/ sangs rgyas kyi khyospyod yul lam myan la// nyan thos sgra rjes 'breng pa spos mo rkos// mtshungs pa myed pa 'dra ba yod myin pas// des na sangs rgyas bsam gyi khyab ces brjod// 
375b4(mdo): gang dag byang chub mchog reg sems yon pas// de dang de dag kyi dag zungs myed kyad// de dag de ring 'jig rten dong chen byed// de dag 'dis ga rten legs par 'tshobam 'gro// bdud rnams bcam ste bdud kyi ris rgyas
375b5(mdo): nas/ char sprin lhun stug wA 'ur tshim par byed// gang de byang chub la bzhugs 'jig rten spyong// de dag nor bdun dag gis bsdu bar byed/ gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang brjod byed pa// nges pa byang chub kar bzhug
375b6(mdo): skye rgya 'gyur// de yim mchod rtedan de dag mya thob la// 'jig rten gyi mchog ma dag du 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur// gang gi rnam par sbyin pas ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// mtho ris 'gro dang byang
375b7(mdo): chub yon tan don gyi phyir// mkhas pa su zhog byis pa dag dang 'gal bar byed// byis pa mkhas pa dag kyi byed// myi shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thob// blun po 'das bying mkhas pa zang la gnas// gang dag chos gyod pa ni de la bzod// 
375b8(mdo): de bas rig pa can byin spang bya zhing // gang dag shes yul rigs ldan bsten par bya// dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang // ting pe 'dzind di la rnal 'byor da bya// sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang // bskal pa khri phrag chad ni
376a1(mdo): bzod byed na// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam myed smos ci rkos// de bas sdug bsngal nyams thag dang du long // bzod dang tingange 'dzi rnyed dag gi go bgos la// brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon// sbyin stobs shes rab mda'
376a2(mdo): ma bdud bcom ste// pham byas byang chub dag la reg par gyis// byams pa'i grogs dang bsgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang // dbyer myed pha rol phyind pa spros byed dang // spro ba'i gnas bcas shugs kyis zas bsten da te// thams cad mkhyen/ 
376a3(mdo): pa'i yon tan thob par gyis// de las ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la// bka dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyor ba kyis// mkhas la ring ba'i skad 'byin dga' ba ltar// thams cad mkhyend pa myur du thob par gyis 6/ mchog tu dgal ba'i
376a4(mdo): rgyal po sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa brtsom dkyus mtha' sas zhes bya ba 'khor theb 'bum rnyed dang / bcas pa zhig bya par gyur da te// ting nge 'dzind 'di ston // ting nge 'dzin 'di snyan pa ma
376a5(mdo): de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas/ dis btsun mo stong dang sras stong la smras pa// ting nge 'dzin zad par snang / ma 'di yi don kyang kyi shes so// ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang kyi nus
376a6(mdo): de ltar yin gyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la// bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing / bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di la rjes su yi rang bar byas pas
376a7(mdo): de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i mdal las/ bskal pa brgyad khri 'khor ba byor bstil nas// de las la phyir phyogs par gyurang to// khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang thob par gyur to// byang chub ji skad bstan pa la yang / 9
376a8(mdo): byed par gyurd to// dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes par byas par gyu rang to// thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzind pa 'di thob par gyur da to// log par ltung ba dang / kyi zham pa dag du nam yang u
376b1(mdo): bar ma gyur da to// rgya de kho nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// mngon par rdzogs pa ma la chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mchog tu dka' ba'i rgyal po khyod do'i che/ de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams ye ho// 
376b2(mdo): ces bya ba khyod kyis/ da gzhan yin no snyam du de ltar blta bar myi phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed de'i tshe/ de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur da to// bskal pa bzang po la de bzhin gsheg/ 
376b3(mdo): pa de dag ni de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ sras stong du gyurd to// de ltar rjes su yi rang ba tsam kyis kyang / ting nge 'dzind 'di mthu' che ba yin na/ klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos kyang ni dgos// mchog tu
376b4(mdo): dka' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs dpa bdud rtsi dka' zhes bya ba/ 'khor 'bum snyed dang / bcas pa zhig byung bar gyurd to// de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
376b5(mdo): blo yangs shes bya bas khang bzangs gser dang ldan pa/ tsan tan dma?/ ra po'i chus btab pa/ a ka ru'i bdug pas/ gdugs pa zhigaphul lo// longs khyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad
376b6(mdo): la yang / de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur do// de dag thams cad la yang skyed mos tshal re re yang phul bar gyu rad to// des bcom ldan 'das 'di las/ ting nge 'dzind 'di bstand pa yang thos so// 
376b7(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rome gro ba mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog/ shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur da to// des 'di snyed du 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzind shes par bya na/ khyim na gnas pas ni/ 
376b8(mdo): 'di rtogs par dka'i/ dzi nas kyang bdag gis sgra dang / kha spu bregs la/ khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung bar bya kor ma chag ko/ zhes smras so// de nas des sgra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos dur spyog bgos te/ 
377a1(mdo): kyis nas khyim myed pan rab tu byung nas/ sras zhi dang / btson mo brgyad stong de dag thams cad dang / lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'da'i rnam pa dag zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
377a2(mdo): de dag gi bsam pa zugs su chud nas kyang / ting nge 'dzin 'di dag mdun gyi bar na kya ma yang dag par bstan to// de dag gis thos nas kyang / gcig la gcig 'di skad/ kye ma ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par dka'
377a3(mdo): mod kyi 'on kyang ting nge 'dzind 'di legs par bris te bcang bar bya'o// zhes 'dzer to// de dag thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzind 'di bris nas kyang / mchod par bya'o// bzung ngo // lung yang 'bog go//

377a5(mdo): thams cad du rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to// smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas/ thams cad kyis byang chub rab tu thob par gyu rang ngo // mchog tu
377a6(mdo): dgra' ba'i rgyal po khyod de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yongs te/ khyod kyis gzhan yin no// snyam pa de skar blta bar gyi bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de/ de'i tshe/ de'i dus na
377a7(mdo): 'khon los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs shes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni/ dge slong rim gro pa shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to// gang dag sras khri bo de dag ni/ bskal pa 'di nas bzung
377a8(mdo): stebaskas pa drug bcu la lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu/ bskal pa grangs myed pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bskas dpa gcig po des/ de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
377b1(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gang dag blon brgyad zhi po de dag ni bskal pa grangs myed pa chen po 'das nas/ bska la pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'chang rgya bar gyi 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu/ bskal pa skad sa lta bu zhes

377b4(mdo): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind de ni/ de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin/ no// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pas/ lus dang / srog la myi lta
377b5(mdo): bar gyur da pas ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bur btsal bar bya'o// tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'cha nga bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin pa 'di la rnal 'byor de du bya'o// 
377b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' saH lang to// sangs rgyas byang chub don tu gnyer ba gang / de dag rgyal ba de'i rjes su slobs// yang dag smrab la gnas pa ma gtogs par/ 
377b7(mdo): gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ma thob myi 'gyur// de ltar 'dir ni dad pa chung bskyed kyang // de bzhin rnam sbyin gya nom thob par 'gyur// de bas g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// 'dir ni ci rigs bkur stir rnam
377b8(mdo): 'byor kyis// rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir bsgrags la// de dag zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang // bstan pa rgya cher bshad par 'dod pa dang // ji ltar bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor da kyis// yid rang
378a1(mdo): sa yang dag dgas dang spyod das pa chos sems sring ba dang // bcub dang / snang ba gang dag sangs rgya bam/ ting nge 'dzin 'das ma ni bsas par bya/ las myong ngo bzhi bdud nams
378a2(mdo): 'joms pa dang / sa stong de bzhin srid pa 'ang byed dang // rnam par rosad dang zhing bkod 'byor pa dag/ 'di dag rab tu ldan la 'grodan ma yin// de bzhin rnam chom slebs pa sum chags dang / 
378a3(mdo): thamamasas pyong byed gsum dag dang // rnams pa di bzhin bachub 'tshar cab/ de dag thams cad 'dir gnas yod pa / pa sas de bskyed cig gis brjod nus rnams
378a4(mdo): saded 'dis sna yinan/ grang sa byedachom sa dga' b.ras byas / kyis rnas ngag na 'gyod paramyangs tede// ma ros byin pa'i snyed ngas bstasang dang / 
378a5(mdo): dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyoral pa dang // sus rten byas pa'i gyod pa gnas pa yis// shes par bya ba dag tu nus ma yin// dus ngan pa dang sems can ma tshungs dang / chos nus

378a7(mdo): gang zhig gis bskam pa stong du thabs mkhas pas pha rol tu phyind pa drug dag la gyod pa bam na ting nge 'dzidang 'di thos nas rjes su mi rang bar byas pa'i bstod
378b1(mdo): rnams kyi phung po snga la des brgya'i char yang nye bar gyi 'gros nas dpe'i bar du yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' grangs byed pa dag gis
378b2(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyu rad to// lha dang / myi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad
378b3(mdo): 'bum snyed dang / rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral ba la chos rnams la chos kyi myig rnam par dag ko// lha de dag chos kyi myi ga rnam par dag pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
378b4(mdo): chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams me tog gis chal par bkram par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen pol
378b5(mdo): 'jig rte nang gi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so bar ldang las kyang lha'i rnga skra dag bsgrags so// ma na/ tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sregs pa/ byang chub sems
378b6(mdo): dpa' bye ba skyedathams cad kyis kyang / ting nge 'dzind thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa sad nas mchog tu dka' ba'i rgyal po
378b7(mdo): las mtshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
379a1(mdo): / rte nad yid rang ste/ thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
379a2(mdo): yi rang ste/ mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa bskasad pa bzang po zhes bya ba
379a3(mdo): lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal ba nyigs kyis zhus te rten la phab pa'o// 
379a4(mdo): mdo sde dam pa 'di gzhengs pas/ yod mchod mtha' sem can rnams rtag tu bar dang ldan gyur nas/ za byed byang nub thob par zhog/ kla shis par gyu sa cig/
